title: New Bedford Whaling National Historical Park: Visitor Centers
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Places To Go     Visitor Centers              Visitor Centers                   National Park Visitor Center      The National Park Visitor Center is located in the heart of New Bedford Whaling National Historical Park. Stop by for a brief orientation and pick up all of the materials you will need before setting out to explore the park, its partners and all the City of New Bedford has to offer.          Operating Hours & Seasons          33 William Street New Bedford, MA 02740 508-996-4095 9:00 am to 5:00 pm 7 days a week year around Closed Thanksgiving, Christmas, & New Years Day                                Waterfront Visitor Center      On New Bedford’s waterfront you can walk about an active commercial fishing port. The exhibits in the City of New Bedford’s Waterfront Visitor Center (Wharfinger Building) engage you in present-day commercial fishing, while outdoor displays at the water’s edge offer glimpses into New Bedford’s maritime past.          Operating Hours & Seasons           New Bedford, MA 02740 508-979-1745 8:00 am - 4:00 pm  Monday - Friday, Labor Day - late March.  8:00 am - 4:00 pm  Monday - Friday, Memorial Day - Labor Day.  9:00 am - 4:00 pm  Saturday & Sunday.  For more information visit: newbedford-ma.gov or destinationnewbedford.org
